channel.title: Open Source on
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on

item.title: Open Sourcing the Enterprise Password Safe
item.description: Some of those who know me may have heard me talk about an Enterprise Password Safe product which I built and worked on from the mid-2000’s up until shortly before joining Facebook. Now I’ve left Facebook and I’ve been looking over my old repos and realised that it’s a project that could benefit from being open-sourced and so I’ve done so via a company I’ve recently acquired an interest in.
